name: Parmesan
description:
Hello! This is Parmesan, a comedy-drama that follows Garm, a misunderstood non-binary person; and it follows their troubles.

Made in 23h 08m 15s for the Non-Binary Game Jam 2021, and the Queer Games Bundle 2021!

Also made with  bitsy, an 8-bit video game engine made by Adam Le Doux.

This is also the first proper video game I've ever made.
Make sure to interact with everything.

Special thanks to Hazel for QA Testing!

A music version with custom lo-fi music is purchasable for just $1.50!
